description.message: A task bit for creating single line response questions. The answer of a user can be automatically evaluated by providing a regular expression. You can also give feedback by using regular expression, as well.

statistic-inputs-description.message: Here you can see the frequency of all answers represented in a cloud. Hovering over an answer will show you the frequency. Green highlighted answers are correct ones.

pattern-error-duplicate.message: A pattern can not contain duplicates

statistic-patterns-description.message: Here you can see the frequency of the found feedback patterns.
